customhtml2_11446045._customHTML:
The All-New Rivera 2

MOVE. MEANT FOR YOU.

customhtml2_copy_cop._customHTML: The all-new Rivera 2 — with Slim Footshape™ Fit — is here to help you move.

image._alt: Shot of rear portion of Altra Lone Peak 6, showing the Ego midsole.

customhtml2_copy_cop_229667436._customHTML:
FIT IN— COMFORTABLY.

Slim FootShape™ Fit, our most form-fitting option, still gives you the space for your feet to sit naturally and comfortably.

customhtml2_copy._customHTML:
ALTRA EGO™... WHEREVER YOU WANT.
Our Altra EGO™ foam is designed to provide a soft yet responsive ride and added flexibility.

MOVE. MEANT FOR ANYTHING.

The versatile Rivera 2 is made for whatever road you take and wherever the road takes you.

content._jcr:description: The Altra Rivera 2 is your new favorite road running shoe. With a Slim FootShape™ Fit and Altra EGO™ foam, the Rivera 2 is designed to help you move naturally.
content._jcr:title: Rivera 2
content._pageTitle: Everyday Training Nuetral Road Shoe - Rivera 2 | Altra Running
